segments.text: I need help in ordering my office supplies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can print out a copy of the Order Supply Form from our company web site and turn in into me . What will you be needing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need ink cartridges , staples , and Post-its .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you need all of them right away or can some wait ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some of these can wait but there are a few things that I need right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can only buy supplies that you have a budget for . Do you know what your budget is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have plenty of money for office supplies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can pick these supplies up or they can be delivered to your building . Which would you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to pick them up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , just finish the request and we will contact you when the supplies come in . Have a good day !
segments.speaker: S2
